prompt: Take my catalog raw_detections.fits, filter out any sources with snr < 5, then crossmatch the result with the Gaia DR3 catalog within 1 arcsecond, keeping only the matched sources, and save the final table as clean_matched.fits.
expected: stilts tpipe in=raw_detections.fits cmd='select "snr >= 5"' | stilts tmatch2 in1=- in2=vizier:I/355/gaiadr3 find=best matcher=sky params=1 values1='RA DEC' values2='RA_ICRS DE_ICRS' ocat=clean_matched.fits
